membership.question: How to become a union member?
membership.answer: You can apply for membership by filling out our registration form and paying the annual fee. Membership is open to all certified teachers.

benefits.question: What benefits do members receive?
benefits.answer: Members receive legal protection, professional development opportunities, access to exclusive resources and representation in salary negotiations.

documents.question: How can I access member-only documents?
documents.answer: After logging into your member account, you can access all private documents through our document center.

grievance.question: How to file a grievance?
grievance.answer: Download the grievance form from our document center or contact our office directly for help with the process.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: We work to defend the rights and interests of university professors in Morocco, improve the quality of higher education, and build a united academic community that contributes to the overall development of the country.
mission.visionDescription: To be the leading union in Morocco and the region for representing university professors and developing higher education, while preserving the highest academic and professional values.
